headline: Boeing Stock Rose. Air India Crash Investigators Focus on Fuel Switches.
summary: Boeing  stock rose Wednesday as investors waited for details from flight data recorders from Air India flight 171, which crashed on June 12, less than a minute after taking off from an airport in Ahmedabad, India.  The Times of India reported Tuesday that a preliminary report had been submitted to officials, citing “top sources.”  Boeing didn’t respond to a request for comment about the report.

raw.headline: Boeing Stock Rose. Air India Crash Investigators Focus on Fuel Switches.
raw.summary: Boeing  stock rose Wednesday as investors waited for details from flight data recorders from Air India flight 171, which crashed on June 12, less than a minute after taking off from an airport in Ahmedabad, India.  The Times of India reported Tuesday that a preliminary report had been submitted to officials, citing “top sources.”  Boeing didn’t respond to a request for comment about the report.

headline: Royal Air Maroc in talks to buy Embraer aircraft, source says
summary: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -Brazilian planemaker Embraer is competing to supply Moroccan airline Royal Air Maroc with its aircraft, a source familiar with the negotiations told Reuters on Wednesday.  The African carrier is looking to expand and renew its fleet in three size categories, and Embraer is fighting to tie up an order in the smallest, the source said.  Earlier on Wednesday, local newspaper Folha de S.Paulo reported that Royal Air Maroc was in talks with several suppliers, including Embraer, to purchase up to 200 aircraft.

raw.headline: Royal Air Maroc in talks to buy Embraer aircraft, source says
raw.summary: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -Brazilian planemaker Embraer is competing to supply Moroccan airline Royal Air Maroc with its aircraft, a source familiar with the negotiations told Reuters on Wednesday.  The African carrier is looking to expand and renew its fleet in three size categories, and Embraer is fighting to tie up an order in the smallest, the source said.  Earlier on Wednesday, local newspaper Folha de S.Paulo reported that Royal Air Maroc was in talks with several suppliers, including Embraer, to purchase up to 200 aircraft.

headline: Thai Airways could firm up Boeing order as part of tariff talks, CEO says
summary: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -Thai Airways International could exercise an existing option to buy more planes from U.S. planemaker Boeing as part of Thailand's tariff negotiations with the United States, CEO Chai Eamsiri told a Reuters NEXT Asia summit on Wednesday.  The flag carrier in February last year said it had ordered 45 Boeing 787-9 wide-body jets with options for a further 35.  Thailand has submitted a new trade proposal to the United States in a bid to avoid steep tariff hikes on its own products.

raw.headline: Thai Airways could firm up Boeing order as part of tariff talks, CEO says
raw.summary: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -Thai Airways International could exercise an existing option to buy more planes from U.S. planemaker Boeing as part of Thailand's tariff negotiations with the United States, CEO Chai Eamsiri told a Reuters NEXT Asia summit on Wednesday.  The flag carrier in February last year said it had ordered 45 Boeing 787-9 wide-body jets with options for a further 35.  Thailand has submitted a new trade proposal to the United States in a bid to avoid steep tariff hikes on its own products.
